title: Episode 12: Humor
description: This week on Hidden Brain, Shankar Vedantam looks at what we find funny and what, well, crosses the line. Comedian Bill Burr joins us to talk about why race, gender and Caitlin Jenner can be so funny.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
